Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its innovative features and high-quality materials. Considering its exceptional value and the satisfaction it can bring, I'm extending this opportunity to you at an introductory price of $120. This is a special offer tailored to appreciate your interest and ensure you experience the best possible outcome with our product. I trust it aligns well with your needs and expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information to make your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
